status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine remained in **Normal Operation** for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with generally **low and steady wind** (mean 1.21 m/s, std 0.39; max 5.2). **Power output stayed near zero and stable** (mean −0.0015, std 0.0003) while **rotor RPM showed no variability** (std 0.0) despite some **generator RPM variability** (std 13.19). A notable operational pattern is the **high average yaw misalignment** (mean 76.6) alongside a **positive mean power residual** (0.1677).
